name: Alien Baby Mama
description:
My entry for the Cosmic Horrors Jam 2022!

I had so much fun making this! My second jam entry! :) Brainstormed with my buddy Matt who helped with sounds! I'm super happy with it and hope you enjoy playing it! The real cosmic horror is what the code looks like under the hood ;) Keyboard + Mouse only!

Lay eggs on the bodies with Q, press R to consume a body then press E to regurgitate the body onto either an egg to hatch it, or onto a baby to grow it into a fighter! Move and attack with WASD and mouse! See how many eggs you can hatch!

Game and art: Reu Durell, Sounds: Matt Dart
